title: Why do lvl 46 needs 3300+ xp to lvl up but a lvl 56 needs 28000 xp to lvl up?
body:
I am am playing LoL an I am lvl 46. I need 3360 xp to lvl up, but my frend lvl 56 needs 2880 xp to lvl up. Why?
Is this a bug or something ty for help.

replies.body:
I can't speak for exactly why they chose the curve they did, but Cactopus did talk a little about the new leveling curve and how it's been slowly adjusted here and there in [**this post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/hAaYMrEs-leveling-and-rewards-early-impressions-and-adjustments).

FYI: Doesn't seem like his links are working from the little issue we had a few days ago, but clicking on them still pulls up the images!
